text: Can you see it? A building has completely collapsed, and the road has caved in.
Smoke is rising from multiple buildings, and flames can be seen.
Currently, Midgar is facing an unprecedented crisis.
The Mako Reactor bombing, the Sector 7 Plate——
Following the collapse of the Sector 7 Plate,
A tornado that suddenly appeared on the Midgar Highway
has caused tremendous damage from Sector 0 to Sector 2.
Mayor Domino and the city authorities, with advice from the Shinra Company,
have stated that this tornado is due to the anti-Shinra group "Avalanche"
using an unknown weapon, according to their announcement.
They will continue to investigate, considering the involvement of Wutai, currently under a ceasefire.
I heard that Midgar was completely caught in the tornado.
I heard it was some kind of explosion.
Maybe the tornado caused an explosion?
Too many things are happening one after another.
Currently, Midgar is facing an unprecedented crisis.
The Mako Reactor bombing, the Sector 7 Plate
Following the collapse of the Sector 7 Plate——
We’ll continue bringing you this live broadcast from the scene.
Search efforts by the Shinra military are still ongoing on the collapsed highway.
One missing person, a former SOLDIER.
Carrying a large sword, the Buster Sword, with a risk of escape.
Repeat: The fugitive is a former SOLDIER carrying the Buster Sword——
Is that someone who was rescued?
Oh no, turn it that way, that way!
We’ve secured the recovery target. Returning by helicopter now.
The helicopter is taking off now.
It appears to be heading toward Sector 5.
I’ll be right back, so keep an eye on this guy.
Emergency request! Confirmed crash landing of an Avalanche transport.
All nearby units, head to the scene immediately. Do not let the perpetrators escape!
One of the Avalanche members, a former SOLDIER carrying the Buster Sword,
may be hiding near the crash site.
Prepare for a counterattack from Avalanche and their collaborators!
Be careful, he might still put up a fight.
The recovery target is a female Ancient. Prioritize securing her.
This is Unit 5 requesting backup! Engaging Avalanche at the transport crash site.
Crash site is near the Sector 5 slum gate. All units, head to the scene!
Confirmed annihilation of the advance team!
Deploying the second team. Requesting continued support.
To Avalanche: Cease resistance and surrender immediately.
If we don’t recover her, it’ll be a huge mess.
I’ll take her home with me.
That house is being watched by Shinra. I’ve checked it out a few times.
They’re gone now. I guess they’ve got bigger things to deal with.
You can’t take care of her, can you?
No, that’s not true! I’ve been looking after Cloud this whole——
It’s all dry, and this dirt!
I prepared myself after seeing the note, but seeing her like this still hits hard.
I borrowed a wheelchair for Aerith. You carry Cloud on your back.
Sorry, I couldn’t do anything for you.
Didn’t know you were such a bookworm.
Last night, there was someone outside the house, right?
He was kinda sneaking around, though.
Wanted posters with his face are plastered everywhere, you know? That’s probably why.
As long as Marlene’s here, he’ll come back.
Biggs isn’t coming back. ‘Cause Daddy and Tifa haven’t come back either!
So Biggs isn’t coming back either.
No, you can say it more!
Hey, do you know this guy in the photo?
Have you seen this guy somewhere?
And then, I felt blood flowing from all over my body.
I thought I’d die when I stopped feeling anything.
I think there was a strong wind blowing.
And it felt like my consciousness was being peeled away from my body.
When I came to, I was lying in the orphanage.
No one knows who found me or who brought me there.
I was up against an army, like, seriously.
Yeah, there was definitely a wind blowing.
I was shocked when I realized I was standing.
It doesn’t make sense, does it?
Surviving only to end up in a world like this.
Why was I the one to survive?
I can’t help but think about it.
Why was I the one left behind among all those members?
What would they want from me if they were here?
Yeah, you think about that stuff.
Bear with me for a bit.
Severe mako poisoning. No signs of recovery yet.
When he gets better, he’ll probably brag about it.
Like, "I came back from mako poisoning."
Is Cloud that kind of guy?
He’s desperate to make himself look valuable.
Even though we already respected him without all that.
Hey, Zack, why don’t you try being a jack-of-all-trades?
There’s quite a demand for it.
"The destruction of Sector 7 was Shinra’s own doing. We can’t overlook Shinra’s tyranny."
"Let’s show them the people’s anger! New Avalanche recruiting members."
Those interested, wait at the outdoor meeting place.
Shinra’s gonna know about this. Even if people show up, they’ll all get caught.
They’ll just shoot them on sight.
idiots who don’t care about that.
You’re not thinking of going, are you?
Have you ever thought about the purpose or meaning of life?
I guess...yeah, I think about it a lot.
Since joining Shinra, a lot’s happened. Like, a whole lot.
I’ve been thinking ever since I woke up. Thanks to that, I’m self-critical every day.
You said earlier that there’s demand for a jack-of-all-trades.
Of course, it’s Cloud. Are you really his friend?
That was the day before the operation...
Wait, how many days ago was that?
I’ve lost my sense of time.
Me too. What’s up with that?
I like being second or third. It’s comfortable.
Rather than deciding whether to do something, I prefer thinking about how to do it.
So, why was someone like me left behind? That’s what it comes back to.
I wonder who caused that wind.
Well, lucky there’s no Shinra around.
I just wanted to see the faces of the idiots who’d show up for such a sloppy poster.
But too bad, looks like I missed out.
Looks like this wasn’t my mission.
It was meaningless. I wasn’t chosen...
Sorry for dragging you into this.
Who said the world is ending?
Something’s off. Why is everyone just accepting it?
We can’t let it stay like this!
Let’s look for something, find something.
I don’t know what yet, but...
Find those and hold onto them tight.
See you then. I’ll visit Cloud sometime.
Make sure you think about it.
I saw Biggs. He’s doing fine.
Did he know anything about Dad or Tifa?
Sorry, we didn’t talk about that.
Zack, could you check on the second floor?
You’ll see them eventually. Everyone’s heading to the same place.
I don’t think it’ll be long.
I’ll take care of Aerith later.
Wait, what do you mean it’s better for Aerith to sleep because Cloud is sick?
Sorry, Marlene, I don’t understand at all.
Big sis will be killed by a scary person.
Cloud will try to save her, but he won’t make it in time.
He’s so close, but he won’t make it!
Big sis is really happy that Cloud, who she really likes, comes for her.
So, we need to cure Cloud quickly so he can protect her.
I believe you. In a world like this, I’ll believe anything.
Who is this scary person? What do they look like?
Hey, I’m going out for a bit. To ask about Cloud.
Don’t be late. We’ve gotten used to having you around.
It’s unsettling when you’re not here.
Got it. I’ll take the bike, so it’ll be quick.
Take care of Aerith and Cloud.
Even if they wake up, don’t let them go anywhere.
I’m not sure. It’s hard to keep her cooped up.
Please, do whatever it takes to stop her.
"I thought about what you said. I’ve been thinking about it ever since."
Dreams and hope, the reason I survived.
Stay as far away from Mako Reactor 6 as possible.
I’m glad I got to see you.
Tseng is in danger, I hear. I’ll take a look.
No, leave it to the medical team.
Professor Hojo, what did we see at that temple?
As a scientist, I can’t say anything rash, but one thing is clear.
Professor Hojo might be able to cure Cloud.
Stop Biggs, prevent the reactor explosion.
Just give up and follow me.
I thought it might be better not to look at the sky.
If you say that, I’m going to look.
I make mistakes like this a lot. I get ahead of myself.
I think this one suits you, miss.
Hmm, maybe I’ll have Cloud pick after all.
Everything’s free! But only one per person.
Alright, Cloud is about to pick his first gift for Aerith.
Really sorry. Here, take this instead.
Thank you for your patronage over the years.
Young man, young lady, take whichever you like.
Oh, those are good, but I’ve got a new product too.
I thought I’d experiment since it’s the end.
Maybe a bit sweeter would be better.
This is going to be tough.
I just asked to see Hojo, right?
Why does it always end up like this?
If I think about it that way, I can do anything!
So you were in this backwater place.
Sorry, I only have one left.
We don’t have any pictures together.
I’ll take the couple with the best vibe.
The reactor’s running, but no Mako is coming up.
No matter what we do, the world is ending.
I got scared during the test and messed up the real thing.
Why was I the one left behind?
I can’t do anything on my own.
I guess I wasn’t chosen after all.
I told you not to say that.
I chose you. That’s why I’m here.
A reactor explosion would be a disaster.
Even if the world’s ending, I can’t just ignore it.
That’s part of it, but I was worried about you first.
Choosing opens up a new world.
I want to take back my life.
What is this? What’s going on?
The lady looks like she’s about to cry.
You two need to get along better.
Before that, explain what’s going on.
Something’s off with the town and with you.
So, want to go to a memorable place?
As if I can choose that easily!
I won’t let it end like this!
We don’t have many special memories, you know.
We can make more from now on.
Is that how you really feel?
I’m glad I heard how you feel.
But there are many kinds of "like."
You’ve been acting strange all day.
This materia will save the world.
They say the crack in the sky will swallow the stars.
I won’t look. I won’t look at the sky.
Is that sky Avalanche’s fault too?
If I can be grateful for being safe today, that’s enough happiness for me.
Ah, the rift in the sky. It’s getting bigger.
I decided to confess to the girl I like! I don’t want to have regrets.
I quit my job to spend the remaining days with my family.
I’m working through my bucket list.
There’s a rumor that Mako energy is running out.
The sun in the slums might stop too.
That rift is divine punishment. It’s time to pay for drowning in Mako.
We who have sinned must accept our punishment.
Everyone dies eventually. Let’s live freely until then.
Let’s all go camping. I bought a new car.
Haha, I’ll show you how big the world is. Let’s make some memories.
We’ve had a lot of fights, haven’t we?
Any complaints you’ve been holding back? Now’s the time to say them.
You always get hungry, no matter what. That’s what being alive is.
I wish we’d gone on more dates.
Sorry for always working. But we can still make it.
Yeah, let’s go everywhere we want!
I wonder what will happen to the baby inside me.
I wanted to see their face.
I don’t know what’ll happen, but I want to call them by name.
Yes, let’s give them the best name.
Sigh, I wish I’d had a lover at least once before dying.
Looking at that light makes me want to cry. I’m so scared...
Aerith was taken away in a wheelchair?
Was she caught in the tornado accident?
I don’t know, but it doesn’t seem serious.
I hope she gets better soon and helps at the shop again.
Yeah, the place feels livelier with Aerith around.
Without Aerith’s special spices, the food doesn’t taste the same.
Exactly, Maruke’s stew has been bland lately.
Thank you for your patronage! We’re having a closing sale!
Everything must go! Take one as a keepsake!
I wonder what’s beyond that rift.
How about one as a memory? It’s free!
Sweet treats, anyone? No charge now.
Young man, young lady, take whichever you like.
I thought I’d get a pro to take my last photo.
I hope I can smile properly...
I want it to look nice.
I wish I’d taken more photos.
I’m still working. I don’t want to think about bad things.
There’s a rumor that a huge meteor will fall from the rift.
It’s too late to regret, but everyone should have followed the teachings of the planet.
Better to do everything now than regret later!
Has Avalanche quieted down? Anti-Shinra activities don’t matter anymore.
They say the tornado caused by Avalanche cracked the sky over Midgar.
It feels like a dream. It doesn’t feel real.
I wish I could have gone to Costa del Sol at least once.
Every night, I wonder if I lived my life right.
All those worries from when life was carefree feel precious now.
Spending every day with family is so happy.
Looking at the rift tightens my chest.
Every morning, I’m relieved to wake up. Good, I’m still alive.
Is it true the reactors are stopping? Because of Avalanche?
My lover died in the Sector 7 accident, so I think it’s okay for me too.
Was that explosion near the church?
Probably Avalanche again. Give it a rest.
What? What’s this? Stop it already!
The explosion was near the church, right? What were they targeting?
Avalanche did something again, didn’t they?
I don’t want to see people die anymore.
Is it true there was a riot?
Maybe blowing up the whole planet would bring peace.
I just want to live quietly...
Shinra can’t even handle Avalanche remnants.
Here’s the latest on the rift that appeared over Midgar.
According to Shinra’s science department, they’ve investigated the rift.
They detected unusual waves, but no harm to humans has been confirmed. It’s not a problem.
Regarding rumors that the planet is ending, Public Security Chief Heidegger said:
"We’re working hard to investigate the cause, so don’t be misled by uncertain information."
In the day after tomorrow’s press conference, President Rufus will report on the tornado damage
and announce measures for the rift.
There’s a theory that the rift is the planet’s lament.
We wasted the planet’s blessings and fought. Maybe it’s angry.
In the end, the planet decides the future, right?
Whether humans survive is up to the planet.
So, what are you going to do?
Hmm, live as usual, I guess.
Boring. Aren’t you going to start something new?
I tried praying at the church for the first time.
It was awkward, but I felt a bit calmer.
Even Shinra might be out of their depth this time.
Maybe I’ll go to Cosmo Canyon and ask for a solution.
They just pray and do nothing.
I’ve lived enough. I have no regrets if my life ends here.
But you all have your lives ahead. I’m so sorry.
Don’t cry, Grandma. It makes me sad too.
What’s going to happen to us?
Wow, the rift is getting bigger!
Do we not have to study anymore?
Is there anything we can do?
She was secretly working at the Honeybee Inn.
Now she’s trying to cheer up the kids with her dancing.
Are you the guy who was with Aerith?
Let’s do whatever we want from now on. First, money. Should we rob someone?
You don’t have to act tough.
People of the planet, look at the sky! Look at that wound of despair!
The planet is suffering, screaming, mourning.
Right now, the planet’s life is about to end.
The Lifestream will soon die out, and our lives will vanish with the planet.
This fate is the planet’s punishment for our foolishness!
People of the planet, look at the sky! Look at that wound of despair!
The planet is suffering, screaming, mourning.
The creaking of the weakened planet tore the sky apart.
That wound in the sky is a symbol of our sins for not listening to the planet’s cries.
I don’t have to go to work anymore.
Even if I run, there’s nowhere to go.
I used to meet for dates here often.
I’m waiting for my wife to come back.
If the trains aren’t running, maybe they’ll send a helicopter.
The spiral tunnel took some heavy damage, I hear.
The whole of Midgar won’t collapse, right?
I want to distract myself with work at times like this.
I heard there’s a riot in Sector 8.
Can you see the rift better from the plate?
This station has seen many meetings and partings. It was loved by everyone.
My boyfriend lives on the plate, so I have many memories here.
My husband hasn’t come back yet.
Is it true that the top of the Shinra Building blew off?
So many things are happening, everyone’s losing the will to live.
Hey, did you hear? Shinra’s going to attack the rift.
I’m kinda expecting Shinra to do something about it.
Maybe it’s because we used too much Mako?
If the trains aren’t running, can I walk up the tracks?
Don’t be fooled by rumors. Shinra made an announcement, right?
All trains to the plate are suspended.
I can’t say when service will resume.
Wait for the Urban Development Department’s announcement.
All trains to the plate are suspended.
I can’t say when service will resume.
Wait for the Urban Development Department’s announcement.
Maruke’s stew. A harmony of sweetness and spice.
Lots of sugar, lots of oil. High calorie!
Sector 5 Slum’s special meatballs. How about it?
The best sweet and spicy meatballs in the slums.
Our secret sauce is the original.
